statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed, date FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT building_id, energy_source FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT COUNT(building_id) AS total_buildings FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 10;
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed, carbon_footprint FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT date, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed, energy_source, carbon_footprint FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE carbon_footprint > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC, building_id DESC;

SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT building_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY building_id
SELECT e.building_id, e.efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency e JOIN energy_consumption_data c ON e.building_id = c.building_id WHERE c.energy_consumed < 500
SELECT building_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN energy_efficiency ON energy_consumption_data.building_id = energy_efficiency.building_id WHERE energy_consumption_data.energy_consumed > 1000 AND energy_efficiency.efficiency_rating > 3;
SELECT building_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY building_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 5000;
SELECT building_id, AVG(efficiency_rating) AS avg_efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY avg_efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT building_id, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed < 500 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC, formatted_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity';
SELECT building_name, total_energy_consumed FROM buildings WHERE total_energy_consumed > 100000 ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT ec.consumption_date, ec.energy_consumed, em.meter_type FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_meters em ON ec.meter_id = em.meter_id ORDER BY ec.consumption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings WHERE total_energy_consumed > 1000;

SELECT building_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM buildings JOIN energy_meters ON buildings.building_id = energy_meters.building_id JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_consumption.meter_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT building_name, energy_consumed FROM buildings JOIN energy_meters ON buildings.building_id = energy_meters.building_id JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_consumption.meter_id WHERE energy_consumed > 500;
SELECT * FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings;
SELECT building_name, built_year FROM buildings ORDER BY built_year DESC;
SELECT building_name, address, efficiency_rating FROM buildings JOIN energy_efficiency ON buildings.building_id = energy_efficiency.building_id;
SELECT building_name, reading_date, consumption FROM buildings JOIN energy_readings ON buildings.building_id = energy_readings.building_id ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM buildings WHERE built_year > 2000 ORDER BY building_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings JOIN energy_efficiency ON buildings.building_id = energy_efficiency.building_id WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;

SELECT buildings.building_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM buildings JOIN energy_readings ON buildings.building_id = energy_readings.building_id GROUP BY buildings.building_name HAVING total_consumption > 1000;
SELECT building_name, address, reading_date FROM buildings JOIN energy_readings ON buildings.building_id = energy_readings.building_id ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, carbon_offset FROM buildings JOIN energy_efficiency ON buildings.building_id = energy_efficiency.building_id WHERE carbon_offset > 50 ORDER BY carbon_offset DESC;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, area_sqft FROM Building WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building WHERE area_sqft > 5000 ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT building_name FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, SUM(area_sqft) AS total_area FROM Building GROUP BY building_name HAVING COUNT(building_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Building ORDER BY building_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, address, area_sqft FROM Building WHERE area_sqft > 5000 AND building_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY area_sqft DESC;
SELECT b.building_name, e.date, e.energy_kwh FROM Building b INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON b.building_id = e.building_id WHERE e.energy_kwh > 1000 ORDER BY e.date DESC;
SELECT b.building_name, c.footprint_metric, c.date FROM Building b LEFT JOIN CarbonFootprint c ON b.building_id = c.building_id WHERE c.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.footprint_metric ASC;
SELECT b.building_name, i.improvement_type, i.cost FROM Building b INNER JOIN EfficiencyImprovements i ON b.building_id = i.building_id WHERE i.cost < 5000 ORDER BY i.cost DESC;
